title: Airbus cuts A330 output, Q1 profit capped by engine delays
text:
Airbus cuts A330 output, Q1 profit capped by engine delays 2:30pm BST - 01:38
Airbus bowed to weak demand for its A330 passenger jet on Friday, announcing a cut in production for 2019 after a series of bruising defeats to Boeing in contests for wide-body jets. David Pollard reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
Airbus bowed to weak demand for its A330 passenger jet on Friday, announcing a cut in production for 2019 after a series of bruising defeats to Boeing in contests for wide-body jets. David Pollard reports. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2r3Qlw0
